gem.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a beautiful stone that has been cut into a special shape
gem.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: something that is very special or beautiful
gem.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Every single ad in the campaign has been a gem.
The Fortune is a tiny gem of a theatre.
gem.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a very helpful or special person
